Sentencas: Protective/conductive coatings that resist oxide scale growth and reduce chromium migration and evaporation are required to make stainless steel interconnect materials for long-term durable operation of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Mn coating on AISI 430 ferritic stainless steel by pack cementation method for SOFC interconnect applications

Sentencas: To accomplish this, the interconnect can be coated by special spinels for their higher conductivity.
Titulo: Mn coating on AISI 430 ferritic stainless steel by pack cementation method for SOFC interconnect applications

Sentencas: In this work, AISI 430 ferritic stainless steel was coated with manganese using the pack cementation method to investigate the oxidation and electrical behaviour at operating conditions of SOFCs.
Titulo: Mn coating on AISI 430 ferritic stainless steel by pack cementation method for SOFC interconnect applications

Sentencas: The oxidation behaviour of coated substrates was studied during different types of oxidation tests.
Titulo: Mn coating on AISI 430 ferritic stainless steel by pack cementation method for SOFC interconnect applications

Sentencas: Area specific resistance (ASR) of the coated substrates was also tested as a function of temperature and time.
Titulo: Mn coating on AISI 430 ferritic stainless steel by pack cementation method for SOFC interconnect applications

Sentencas: The results showed that the formed Mn3O4 and MnFe2O4 spinels improved oxidation resistance by limiting the outward diffusion of Cr cations and the inward diffusion of oxygen anions.
Titulo: Mn coating on AISI 430 ferritic stainless steel by pack cementation method for SOFC interconnect applications

Sentencas: These spinels also caused a reduction of ASR for coated substrates (17.4 m Omega cm(2)) as compared to uncoated substrates(36.1 m Omega cm(2)) after 200 h of isothermal oxidation at 800 degrees C. (C) 2011
Titulo: Mn coating on AISI 430 ferritic stainless steel by pack cementation method for SOFC interconnect applications
